method.text: Make, and chill the creme patisiere
Beat the creme patisiere to loosen it up and make it smooth again
Add a third of the cream to the creme patisiere and beat it in. Then fold in the remaining cream

notes.text: This is a pretty standard ratio of creme patisiere to whipped cream, but any ration you want can be used
If the creme diplomat needs to be kept for a long time, it's good to stabilize your whipped cream with some gelatine before combining with the creme patisiere
